channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Gang graffiti, 3rd May
item.description:
‘Gold leaf gang’ and other graffiti up
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 137 Swindon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor repair breaking up again., 3rd May
item.description:
Utility work originally done poorly, had bodged repair in March which was breaking up within days of 'repair'. It was reported in March but nothing has been done. Surface continues to break up and potholes are re-forming. Loose gravel from the potholes is making the turn from Hucclecote Road into Chosen Way potentially dangerous for cycles and motorcycles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 29 Hucclecote Road, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo bin needs clearing, 2nd May
item.description:
The dog poo bin to the back of the grass triangle, just as you leave to go into the Charlton Park estate needs clearing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 39 King William Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo bin needs clearing, 2nd May
item.description:
The dog poo bin on the back way into Charlton Park (nearest the Moorend Road entrance) needs clearing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Brook House Moorend Road, Charlton Park
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement impassable for disabled people, 1st May
item.description:
Tree stump left in pavement. Pavement impassable for wheelchair users, families with buggies. Hazard for blind people.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Tamar Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous crossing, 1st May
item.description:
The pedestrian just after the roundabout onto Princess Elizabeth Way needs attention. 4 times in the last 2 months I've been crossing with a pushchair and cars have gone sailing through a red light. It's an accident waiting to happen. I don't know of it's because the crossing is so close to the roundabout that cars aren't aware it's a crossing. Needs to be better signed, or a camera installed to catch those going through a red light.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 593 Princess Elizabeth Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken drain on roadside, 1st May
item.description:
Sunken drain has been getting worse (over many years), probably never reported. Large dip in the road created.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Ullenwood Park Farm A436, Ullenwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken tarmac on junction with lane to Coberley, 1st May
item.description:
Adjacent pothole fixes recently somehow missed this worsening sunken hole.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A436, Ullenwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trip hazard, 30th April
item.description:
The tarmac around this BT access lid (next to lamp-post no3) has worn away and someone has tripped over it, pjease could this be dealt with.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Beaumont Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes at foot of Charlton abbots hill, 30th April
item.description:
Lots of potholes spread over 100metres or so at the foot of Charlton abbots hill just before the junction with Charlton abbots village to the right. Potholes are damaging vehicle wheels and suspension and are dangerous for cyclist. This whole section has been reported for at least a couple of years but little is ever done to repair the surface
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrowning hedge and tree need attention, 30th April
item.description:
In the green space next to 11 Carlyle Grove.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Carlyle Grove, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 29th April
item.description:
I reported this road 2 weeks ago and received an email that the issue has been fixed. It hasn't, there are multiple potholes on the road going up the hill. Motorists regularly drive in the centre of the road to avoid.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A436, Andoversford
Report on FixMyStreet
